Prebon followed Attilla into the room stepping aside to watch the Drakon le=
ave. I see you enjoy history almost as much as I do." he claimed picking up=
 the book and tossing it back to Shivah.  "I see that you are Predacon but =
I am unaware of your rank or subgroup." the snide Trainers manners were upa=
lling as he stared the other bot eye to eye. "Now tell me, why was I transf=
erred here and where are the recruits that need to be placed in line?" A tr=
ainer unit was only used for recruitment programming, a sort of Boot camp f=
or Transformers. A dull unglorified life as it were, work with the new unit=
s and watch them soar through the ranks to end up bossing around thier form=
er commanders. As a Trainer unit the only authority he had was on the train=
ing field, now that he was removed he'd be lucky to be looked at as a quali=
fied unit commander.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000@yaho=
o.com 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 11:32 PM
=
  Subject: RE: It's Showtime


  Attilla/Shivah:

  Shivah was sat camly re=
ading a cyberbook in one room when Attilla arrived, the first-born of Drako=
nbots didn't noticed that about (Attila's arriving ) until his young brothe=
r snatched the cybe-book and Attilla shouted while he wished annoy his old =
brother. 

   
  "What are you reading Old-bro??? "THE PREDACON'S WARS... "=
 UGHHH!!! You should better do other things than read a bored History book!=
!!.. " 

  "Who doesn't know what were past's mistakes, he will make them i=
n the future... If we like beat our enemies, we must study our past... it's=
 easy to understand" replyed Shivah aparently calmed.

  "I Insist that you=
 should better do other things, bro" said Attilla "Well, my pal Preborn has=
 some complaints and he likes speak with you... So I leave you alone"

  An=
d Attila left the place throwing the cyber-book toward a table that was aro=
und, Shivah sighed and waited that Preborn spoke.

    ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: T=
uesday, May 29, 2001 4:10 AM
    Subject: Re: It's Showtime


    Prebon fo=
llowed Attilla at a safe distance. He wanted to remain out of the other bot=
s reach in case this was some sort of trick. He serveyed each twist and tur=
n downloading it to memory so he wouldn't get lost.
      ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
      From: airly2000@... 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
      Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:49 PM
      Subject: RE: It's Show=
time


      "Ok Preborn" said Attilla "Let's go to see Shivah, i can bet t=
hat I know where's he right now"

      Attilla walked and he invited Prebo=
rn to follow him



        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: CYB=
ERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 29,=
 2001 3:38 AM
        Subject: Re: It's Showtime


        Prebons face nea=
rly turned to shock. this bot seemed like it was completely oblivious to th=
e name Prebon. His very name was spoken with honor for being the Trainer of=
 some of the most successfull units in the Predacon army. "My name is Prebo=
n, remember it with respect and dignity." this bot obviously needed to be t=
aught some order. Prebon began to wonder if that is why he had been selecte=
d to transfer to this out of the way rock in the universe.
          ----- =
Original Message ----- 
          From: airly2000@... 
          To: =
nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:23 PM
     =
     Subject: RE: It's Showtime


          Attilla:

          "Don't pres=
s your luck, dwarf" said inside his mind the male and told to Preborn with =
the same tone "Follow me... with whom I have the honor?"
            ----- =
Original Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 3:15 AM
        =
    Subject: Re: It's Showtime


            Prebon looked over Attilla, th=
e oposite bot was slightly taller and more armored than himself, The former=
 Trainer leader always tried to size up a possible opponent before a fight.=
 "Very well" he said crossing his arms tightly in a peturbed fashion, "Then=
 I will ask Shivah about how I AM to be treated." His arms went to his side=
s and he turned towards the door. "If you would be so considerate as to int=
roduce us I would be greatfull" He continued in mock courtesy making a requ=
est sound like an order.
              ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
        From: airly2000@... 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
 
              Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 9:13 AM
              Subject: R=
E: It's Showtime


              Attilla:

              "Nope, it isn't th=
e way " answered  Attilla "What do you think if Shivah solve this trouble..=
. He can explain you what happened Ok?"
                ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
                Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:46 AM
         =
       Subject: Re: It's Showtime


                Prebon stepped out, his=
 memories were either gone or distorted but his leadership programs were st=
ill intact. He remembered how roughly he was treated and how he was slammed=
 into the CR chamber. To top it off he was always cranky when he woke up. "=
What is the meaning of this travesty?" he yelled. He saw Predacon emblem on=
 Attilla so he knew thought he wasn't a POW. "Is this any way to treat one =
of the Predacons best training units?" his record of service would have spo=
ke for itself if he hadn't erased it when he left the Predacons to start hi=
s own unit.
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
               =
   From: airly2000@... 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

                  Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 10:01 PM
                  Su=
bject: RE: It's Showtime


                  Attilla:

                  "M=
emories erased, reprogramation ended"thought Attilla "This guy is ready to =
start duties."

                  Attilla typed some buttons and watied to =
Cr's door 0pen, "Hey, Hello"

                  The bot was ready to fight =
just in case.
